titleStmt.title: A second part to the mothers blessing: or A cure against misfortunes. Diuided into certaine principall receipts, to cure the mind of man. / By G.M..
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.P. for Thomas Dewe, and are to be sold in S. Dunstans Church-yard.,
